item.title: DotCIO Announces Next Phase of AFS Retirement
item.description: As previously announced, Andrew File System (AFS), a legacy file storage system, needs to be retired to maintain an acceptable cybersecurity posture for the Institute. The service will be retired in stages and sunsetting completely in September 2024. Among affected services, AFS housed all content for homepages.rpi.edu and dept.rpi.edu. The next stage of this process, access to departmental and personal AFS space (homepages/dept), will be discontinued on June 5, 2024.

item.title: “Center of Gravity” Series to Continue on June 5
item.description: Date: Wednesday, June 5, 2024 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM - The Center of Gravity is your one-stop for personal, academic and well-being success this summer! Activities include novelty food and snacks, academic support from peer tutors and course TAs, away semester searches with the CCPD, wellness and well-being activities, water coloring, Legos, book clubs and more, so be sure to visit weekly!
item.author: Community

item.title: Don’t Miss the Albany Pride Parade!
item.description: Date: Sunday, June 9, 2024 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Shuttle shuttle service will start making trips at 11:00am from the Student Union Horseshoe to Albany for the Albany Pride Parade, which will take place in and around Washington Park. Shuttles will make trips to and from Albany throughout the day; the last shuttle to return to RPI will depart Albany at 4:30pm.

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering Birthday Specials for Faculty, Staff
item.description: The Collegiate Store is happy to announce that it will be celebrating RPI faculty and staff birthdays with an invitation to shop for one clothing or gift item at 20% off. Beginning in March 2024, faculty and staff can just come in during their birthday month to get their coupon, which can then be used in-store or online.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Training, Resources to Assist Faculty with Adding Questions to End-of-Term Evaluations
item.description: Summer II end-of-term course evaluations will be open to students June 17-29, with reports available to instructors on July 26, and instructors who want to add questions to their courses have until June 16 to set them up in HelioCampus. The Office of Undergraduate Education will offer training; resources are also available on the HelioCampus Resource Site.

item.title: TIAA Offering Confidential In-Person Reitement Counseling June 12
item.description: Date: Wednesday, June 12, 2024 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!
